Description:
Forest Nibela dies. After the powerful storm has launched a chain of devastating events, our infamous hero must hit the road to find their courage and fight with arch enemy to save your House. ORI and the Blind Forest talks about the fate of a young orphan who is ordained destiny hero, in an incredibly colorful action-platformer developed by Moon Studios for the PC. Game Ori and the Blind hand-drawn images of different Forest, incredible animation of characters and well developed system of set points, and is a deeply emotional story about love and sacrifice, as well as the hope of living in all of us
